participant_2.background:
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
i enjoy fishing.
I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
I am a student and my family is in business.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! How's it going?
It's going pretty good! I just got done working out, and now I'm getting ready to cook some lunch.
That's great! I usually start my day with a workout too. It helps me get my body moving and my mind sharp.
Me too! I feel like I can take on anything after a good workout.
I agree! I also love to fish. It's a great way to relax and enjoy nature.
I've never been fishing before, but it sounds like fun!
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to get outdoors and catch some fresh food.
I might just have to do that! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm the general manager of the local grocery store. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
That sounds like a great job! I'm a student right now, but my family is in business.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying business administration. I want to eventually take over my family's business.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to rescue animals! I'm single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
That's so kind of you! I'm sure the animals appreciate it.
They do! It's so rewarding to help animals in need.
It sounds like you have a very busy schedule, but you seem to enjoy it!
I do! I love my life
